code: import{likepost}from"../../types";export var LikePostAction=function LikePostAction(){return{type:likepost};};var LikePostFunction=function LikePostFunction(props,post_id){return function(dispatch){var URL="https://tracey.propulsion-learn.ch/backend/api/social/posts/toggle-like/"+post_id+"/";var token=props.props.SignInReducer.token;var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)});var config={method:'POST',headers:headers};fetch(URL,config);dispatch(LikePostAction());};};export default LikePostFunction;
